title: 9 Times Bollywood Actresses Gave Us Curly Hair Inspiration
text:
Prev Next Curly hair is most coveted, but very difficult to maintain. There are multiple types of curly hair – loose waves, spiral curls, and tight coils. But each one looks stunning. While some people are blessed with this lovely hair texture naturally, there are others who are not, but that doesn’t stop them from achieving those curls. If you need some curly hair inspo, here are nine instances of our favourite Bollywood actresses embracing their curls. 
Disha Patani 
The M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story actress slayed with a head full of ringlets at Manish Malhotra’s 50th birthday bash. 
Saiyami Kher 
The newcomer has had us floored with her gorgeous curls, since her Bollywood debut. 
Priyanka Chopra 
PeeCee is killing it with her loose curls, on set for Quantico season two. 
Kriti Sanon 
Also at designer Manish Malhotra’s birthday party, Kriti sported beautiful loose waves. 
Bipasha Basu 
Bipasha always has always had the most enviable loose waves. 
Athiya Shetty 
We’re loving Athiya’s loose curls. 
Juhi Chawla 
Manish Malhotra’s epic birthday party seemed like the night of curly hair, with Juhi also joining the curl brigade with loose, turned out waves. 
Alia Bhatt 
Alia looks adorable with her short hair full of loose ringlets, while promoting Dear Zindagi . 
Kangana Ranaut
